newsitem.title: UK: SocGen appoints investment banking vice chair.
newsitem.headline: SocGen appoints investment banking vice chair.

text.p: Societe Generale said it has appointed Robert S. Pirie as vice chairman of its investment banking division and a senior member of its international mergers and acquisitions group.
Pirie was chief executive officer of Rothschild Inc for eleven years and has been senior managing director at Bear Stearns for the past three years.
SocGen said the appointment formed part of the process of building its international M&A advisory business as part of its overall investment banking effort. -- London Newsroom +44 171 542 7717.
